alert.note: Alert for Modoc County; North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County; Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued June 20 at 12:45PM PDT until June 21 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures from the mid-30s to mid-20s and as low as 14 degrees expected. * WHERE...In California, Northeast Siskiyou County and Modoc County. In Oregon, Klamath and Lake Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Modoc County; North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County; Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties
